titleStmt.title: The new invention for the sheathing of ships with lead and lacker, without the use of pitch, tar, rozin, brimstone, or any other graving,.
titleStmt.author: Rastel, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: At end: "Mr. Thomas Rastel, at the Jerkers office in the Custome-house, or to the said Mr. Rastel or Mr. Francis Dracot, at Mr. Garraway's coffee-house ... ".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
